summary: Adds a GOT-inspired follower to Your game. Standalone + using vanilla system.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][img width=944,height=531]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/88213/88213-1512328152-645204000.jpeg[/img]

[b]About:

System: vanilla (should be completely compatible with follower managing mods)
Perks: Related to one-handed, two-handed and dualwielding
Voice: Male Brute
Marriable: Yes
This mod includes esp- hair- and face files. Sandor will use what ever body You have as the default male body.
You can find Sandor sandboxing with the hippie-hunters near Eldergleam sanctuary.[/b]


[/size][size=3][b]Used Mods/Credits/Thanks[/b][/size][size=3]
